events.name: CampaignCreated
events.description: Triggered when a new marketing campaign is initiated.

events.name: CampaignLaunched
events.description: Indicates that a campaign is live and actively running.

events.name: CampaignEnded
events.description: Marks the completion of a marketing campaign.

events.name: TargetAudienceDefined
events.description: Refers to the identification of the campaign's target audience.

events.name: CampaignPerformanceReviewed
events.description: Indicates that the campaign's performance metrics have been analyzed.

commands.name: CreateCampaign
commands.description: Triggered when a new marketing campaign is initiated.

commands.name: LaunchCampaign
commands.description: Indicates that a campaign is live and actively running.

commands.name: EndCampaign
commands.description: Marks the completion of a marketing campaign.

commands.name: DefineTargetAudience
commands.description: Refers to the identification of the campaign's target audience.

commands.name: ReviewCampaignPerformance
commands.description: Indicates that the campaign's performance metrics have been analyzed.

integrationPoints.name: Sales
integrationPoints.description: Sales context should integrate to align on how campaigns impact sales.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerSupport
integrationPoints.description: Customer Support should integrate to manage inquiries related to marketing campaigns.

integrationPoints.name: Analytics
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Analytics to track campaign effectiveness and customer engagement.
